import React from 'react' import { Card, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import man from '../../assets/Characters/man.png' import women from '../../assets/Characters/women.png' import meteorCrash from '../../assets/Events/meteorCrash.png' import placeholder from '../../assets/placeholder.png' const CardEvent = (props) => { let imageLink = "https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg"; if (props.event){ return( {props.event.title} Happened in 2019 {props.event.text} ) } if (props.character){ return (
{props.character.name} Joined in 2019 {props.character.story} {props.character.role}
)} if (props.place){ return(
{props.place.name} Found in 2019 {props.place.description}
) } } export default CardEvent
